actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to improve the financial solvency of multiemployer pension plans, and for other purposes.
short_title: Multiemployer Pension Plan Reform Act of 1985

summary.text: Multiemployer Pension Plan Reform Act of 1985 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to require multiemployer pension plan actuaries to assume a specified interest rate in determining the unfunded vested benefits of a multiemployer pension plan for purposes of determining an employer's withdrawal liability under special provisions for multiemployer pension plans under ERISA provisions relating to plan termination insurance.

titles.title: Multiemployer Pension Plan Reform Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to improve the financial solvency of multiemployer pension plans, and for other purposes.
